mapper.select: SELECT ID, updater, code, `sub-code`, img, `item-name`, `unit-ch`, rate, kg, material, `material-ch`, height, width, depth, doru FROM syouhin WHERE `code` = #{code} ORDER BY `updatetime` DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `syouhin` (`code`,`updatetime`,`updater`,`sub-code`,`img`,`item-name`,`unit-ch`,`rate`,`kg`,`material`,`material-ch`,`height`,`width`,`depth`,`doru`) values( #{code}, #{updatetime}, #{updater}, #{sub_code}, #{img}, #{item_name}, #{unit_ch}, #{rate}, #{kg}, #{material}, #{material_ch}, #{height}, #{width}, #{depth}, #{doru} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE `updatetime`=VALUES(`updatetime`),`updater`=VALUES(`updater`),`sub-code`=VALUES(`sub-code`),`img`=VALUES(`img`),`item-name`=VALUES(`item-name`), `unit-ch`=VALUES(`unit-ch`),`rate`=VALUES(`rate`),`kg`=VALUES(`kg`), `material`=VALUES(`material`),`material-ch`=VALUES(`material-ch`),`height`=VALUES(`height`), `width`=VALUES(`width`),`depth`=VALUES(`depth`),`doru`=VALUES(`doru`)
